job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for architecture design and maintenance of Next Generation Distributed Storage
job_tasks.justification: Designing and maintaining distributed storage systems involves significant software development aspects for building robust and scalable infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure the architecture to meet SDS (Software Defined Storage) scenarios, HCI scenarios and hybrid cloud scenarios.
job_tasks.justification: Meeting specific architectural scenarios like SDS and HCI implies the development and integration of software components.

job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for the development of Reference Architectures and technology standards based on Infrastructure Building Blocks, that can be offered as services to our internal customers
job_tasks.justification: Developing reference architectures and standards for infrastructure services aligns with software development practices for creating reusable components and services.

job_tasks.phrase: Demonstrate a high level of technical expertise to support complex Storage & Backup devices, including SAN, NAS and Backup solutions across all tiers, under minimal supervision
job_tasks.justification: Supporting and maintaining complex storage devices and solutions in a production environment falls under operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for the design, implementation, security and availability of Storage, Backups and SAN infrastructure, based on business requirements while adhering to tight operations, security, and procedural models
job_tasks.justification: Designing, implementing, and ensuring the security and availability of infrastructure are core software development and operations tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Operate in complex, highly-secure, highly-available, operations-centric datacenter environments and interact with other technology domain experts as required, to build and maintain the Storage and Backups solutions in those datacenter environments
job_tasks.justification: Operating in datacenter environments and maintaining solutions is a direct responsibility of operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for complex provisioning, advanced maintenance, data replication, disaster recovery, data migration and documentation for our Storage and Backup environments
job_tasks.justification: Tasks like provisioning, maintenance, disaster recovery, and data migration are all key aspects of operations engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Write technical design and build documentation for storage infrastructure
job_tasks.justification: Creating technical documentation for infrastructure design and build is a common task in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for technology strategy, engineering standards, methodologies, task-plans and best practices for Storage Engineering.
job_tasks.justification: Defining technology strategy, standards, and best practices for engineering is part of the operational and strategic oversight in engineering roles.

soft_skills.phrase: interact with other technology domain experts as required
Demonstrate a high level of technical expertise to support complex Storage & Backup devices
Responsible for architecture design and maintenance of Next Generation Distributed Storage

classification.rationale: This job description focuses heavily on traditional storage infrastructure, data management, and datacenter operations. It lacks any mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies that would align it with the ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles. The core responsibilities are centered around building and maintaining storage platforms, not AI model development or deployment.
